lang.item: Please, fill in all the required fields.
The password given does not match with the password confirmation.
The user requested does not exist.
Nickname length must be between 3 and 30 characters.
The email given is not valid.
The email given is already in use.

Welcome on {site_name}!

Your account on {site_name} got validated by an administrator.

You can login with your account on the website: Login

If the link does not work, paste this link in your browser:
{base}/user/login/

{site_name}

Dear user,

Your inscription on {site_name} was not accepted.

For further information, please, contact an administrator.

{site_name}
The user %s is not to be checked.
No user found in the database.
Leave empty to let the password unchanged.
Neither specific permissions, nor admin zone for this app.

Dear user,

An account was just created for you on the website {{site_name}}

To login, proceed to {{base}}/user/login/.

Here are you login data :

  • ID : {{nickname}}
  • Password : {{password}}

These information are personnal.
To change them, go to your profile.

{{site_name}}

--------------
This is an automatic message.
An unknown error occured when trying to create your account in the database.
An unknown error occured while trying to edit the account %s in the database.
Send the new account's data by email?
Notice: you are editing your own account. Changes will take effect immediately.
By sending the edition form of this user, its account will be validated and he will be notified by email.
Are you sure you want to delete the user %s?
You cannot delete your own account.
Default access for users belonging to the group
No group found in the database.
Do you really want to delete the group %s?
An unknow error occured while trying to apply changes to the group.
An unknown error occured while trying to apply changes to the group in the database.
The group selected was deleted successfully.
Are you sure you want to delete the group %s?
Applying new access rights to the group %s
Apply new access rights to all users having the previous group access
Apply new access rights to all users having custom access
Select the users to overwrite access with the new group access.
Permissions shared with the new group access
Permissions in addition to the new group access
Permissions missing compared to the new group access
At registering, check user email by sending a mail
Send a user account summary by mail
Validate all new users by an administrator
Keep deleted and refused account in the database, inactiving them
The user configuration was updated successfully.
